meanings.definition: The quality or state of being profuse; extravagance.
meanings.sent1: Her profuseness in giving gifts to everyone during the holidays was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The profuseness of decorations in the party hall made it look like a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent3: The profuseness of confetti at the celebration created a colorful blizzard of paper bits.
meanings.sent4: His profuseness in compliments was like a fountain of praise, never-ending and sincere.
meanings.sent5: The profuseness of flowers in the garden was a sight to behold, a riot of colors and scents.

meanings.sent1: The profuseness of food at the buffet left everyone feeling full and content.
meanings.sent2: The profuseness of stars in the night sky was breathtaking, like a blanket of twinkling lights.
meanings.sent3: The profuseness of toys in the store made it hard for the children to choose just one.
meanings.sent4: The profuseness of rain during the storm caused flooding in the streets.
meanings.sent5: The profuseness of books in the library offered endless options for reading and learning.
